text.title: Text Generation (Chat Completions)
text.description: GLM-4 series large language model chat completion interface. Fully compatible with OpenAI Chat Completions API format, supporting streaming output and function calling.

parameters.model: Model name: GLM-4-Plus, GLM-4-Air, GLM-4-AirX, GLM-4-Long, GLM-4-FlashX, GLM-4-Flash
parameters.messages: Array of conversation messages, each containing role and content
parameters.max_tokens: Maximum number of tokens to generate
parameters.stream: Whether to use streaming output, default false

vision.title: Multimodal Understanding (Vision)
vision.description: GLM-4V series multimodal model supporting image understanding and visual question answering.

parameters.messages: Message list, content can include text and image_url
parameters.max_tokens: Maximum number of tokens to generate

image.title: Image Generation (CogView)
image.description: CogView series AI image generation model supporting text-to-image.

parameters.n: Number of images to generate, default 1

video.title: Video Generation (CogVideoX)
video.description: CogVideoX AI video generation model supporting text-to-video.

voice.title: Voice Model (GLM-4-Voice)
voice.description: GLM-4-Voice voice dialogue model supporting text-to-speech.

embedding.title: Embedding (Embedding-3)
embedding.description: Text embedding interface for semantic search and text similarity computation.

parameters.input: Text or array of texts to embed

tools.title: Web Search (Tools)
tools.description: Web search tool supporting real-time web information retrieval.
